    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electron beams in a television tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronenstrahlen in einem Fernsehengefäß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faisceaux d'électrons dans un tube de 
télévision</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Feixes de elétron em um tubo da televisão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fasci elettronici in un tubo della televisione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δέσμες ηλεκτρονίων σε έναν τηλεοπτικό σωλήνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haces electrónicos en un tubo de la televisión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how charged plates control the direction of an electron beam in a television tube.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charged plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron beam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">television screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">television tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie belastete Platten die 
Richtung eines Elektronenstrahls in einem Fernsehengefäß steuern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les plats 
chargés contrôlent la direction d'un faisceau d'électrons dans un 
tube de télévision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as placas carregadas
controlam o sentido de um feixe de elétron em um tubo da televisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le piastre 
caricate gestiscono il senso di un fascio elettronico in un tubo della
televisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα χρεωμένα πιάτα 
ελέγχουν την κατεύθυνση μιας δέσμης ηλεκτρονίων σε έναν 
τηλεοπτικό σωλήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las placas 
cargadas controlan la dirección de un haz electrónico en un tubo de 
la televisión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">belastete Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronenstrahl</string>
